headline: How Northern Trust’s Expanded AMF Pension Mandate At Northern Trust (NTRS) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Northern Trust has renewed and expanded its long-term mandate with Swedish pension provider AMF Tjänstepension AB, continuing as custodian for AMF’s global pension assets while adding investment operations and trade services across the fund’s entire portfolio. This deeper role with a major Nordic pension investor highlights Northern Trust’s ability to broaden higher-value asset-servicing relationships built over more than two decades. Next, we’ll examine how this expanded AMF mandate could...
